pages.text: Poles can be use for attachment points for Wire Connectors. After placing an Extendable Post, you can put any metal fence down the middle to create a $(l)pole$(), and keep placing them as high as you like. Treated Wood Fences work, too.

Using an $(hammer) on a pole that has been inserted into a post will attach an arm to it. Using the Hammer on an arm will further extend it. $(br)You can also place a $(l:transportation/power#transformer)Transformer$() on the pole, which makes it less obtrusive.$(br)If you need to, you can place solid blocks on Extendable Posts to hide them.
Similarly, wallmounts can be used to place wire connectors upright or upside-down on walls.
